SQLWhere.SQLJoin: left outer join dbo.SESSIONRESTRICT sr on sr.ID=tblmain.IDI and sr.CLASS='INSTRUMENT' And sr.SESSIONID='%%SESSIONID%%'
SQLWhere.SQLWhere: ( (sr.ID is not null) or ( (not exists(select 1 from dbo.INSTRUMENTMODEL where IDI = tblmain.IDI)) and ((tblmain.IDAINS=%%ID_USER%% And tblmain.IDAUPD is null) Or tblmain.IDAUPD=%%ID_USER%%) ) )
